name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
1.傳輸線
2.散射參數
3.微波主動元件
4.寬頻放大電路
5.低雜訊放大電路
6.功率放大器
7.高穩定振盪器
8.壓控振盪器
9.鎖相迴路
10.混波器
Understanding the theory, applications, and implementation of microwave active circuits including the power amplifier, low-noise amplifier, and oscillator etc.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Basic Concepts in RF Design
Week 3: Modulation and Wireless Standards
Week 4: Power Amplifier (PA) part1
Week 5: Power Amplifier (PA) part2
Week 6: Transmitter (Tx) part1
Week 7: Transmitter (Tx) part2
Week 8: Low-Noise Amplifier (LNA) and Receiver (Rx)
Week 9: Oscillator and Simulation Softwares
Week 10-13: Project I: Oscillator design and implementation
Week 14: Project I: Oscillator circuit measurement
Week 15-17: Project II: Mixer design and implementation
Week 18: Project II: Mixer circuits measurement
scorePolicy:
實作一 Project I : 50%  (電路特性: 35% , 口試: 15%)
實作二 Project II : 50%  (電路特性: 35% , 口試: 15%)
materials:
RF Circuit Design Theory and Applications by Reinhold Ludwig and Pavel Bretchko
RF Microelectronics by Behzad Razavi
